english.segment2: Ya ya ya, ya ya ya. Whoo. Ya ya ya, ya ya ya
english.segment3: VERSE. Everyone can see we're together. As we walk on by. And we fly just like birds of a feather. I won't tell no lie. All of the people around us they say. Can they be that close. Just let me state for the record. We're giving love in a family dose
english.segment4: CHORUS. We are family. I got all my sisters with me. We are family (we are family). Get up everybody and sing
english.segment5: VERSE. Living life is fun and we've just begun. To get our share. Of the world's delights. High hopes we have. For the future. And our goal's in sight. No we won't get depressed. Here's what we call. Our golden rule. Have faith in you and the things you do. You won't go wrong, oh no. This is our family jewel, ya, ya
english.segment6: CHORUS. We are family. I got all my sisters with me. We are family (we are family). Get up everybody and sing (Sing it to me, sing it now). We are family (Everybody hey, hey). I got all my sisters with me (I got all my sisters with me). We are family (we are family)(Ya ya ya ya). Get up everybody and sing (Sing it to me)
english.segment7: BREAK. Whoo. Get up everybody. Jump. Here we go. (Get up) Get up, get up. Get up, get up
english.segment8: We are family (we are family). I got all my sisters with me (I got all my sisters). We are family (we are family). Get up everybody and sing. Oh oh oh oh ya!
